VOG-25R grenade
VOG-25R
A standard round for the Colt 1911 and the Sig 220 pistols. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet.
An Hydro-Shock round with improved characteristics for the Colt 1911 and the Sig 220 pistols. It has a hollow-point bullet with a good stopping effect.
A standard 12 calibre round filled with 6 mm shot. It has an enormous killing power at a close range. It is designed for the TOZ-34, the BM-12, the Winchester 1300 and the SPAS 12 shotguns. It is most effective at ranges under 30 meters.
A finned bullet. It can stabilize in flight, which increases its accuracy. It is designed for the TOZ-34, the BM-12, Winchester 1300 and the SPAS 12 shotguns. It has an armor-piercing effect and an increased range. It is effective at a range of up to 150 meters.
A round with a heavy naked bullet. It is usually used for big game hunting, but can be used for other purposes. Its heavy bullet does not pierce but actually forces itself through bulletproof vests. It is designed for the TOZ-34, the BM-12, the Winchester 1300 and the SPAS 12 shotguns. It is effective at a range of up to 100 meters.
An armor-piercing round for the AKS-74, the AKS-74U and the AN-94 assault rifles. It has an improved armor-piercing effect, but a decreased stopping effect.
A standard round for the AKS-74, the AKS-74U and the AN-94 assault rifles. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet.
A round with an armor-piercing bullet for the L85, the LR300, the Sig550, the G36 and the FN2000 assault rifles.
A standard NATO round widely-known under its Belgian SS109 index. It is used with the L85, the LR300, the Sig550, the G36 and the FN2000 assault rifles.
A cheap modification of the sniper round for the SVD, SVU-AS sniper rifles and the PKM machine gun.
A sniper round for the SVD and the SVU-AS sniper rifles and for the PKM machine gun. It has an improved accuracy and range.
A round with an armor-piercing bullet for the SVD and the SVU-AS sniper rifles and for the PKM machine gun.
A standard round for the PM, PB, Fort-12 pistols. It has a standard core and a full-jacketed bullet. It has a weak armor-piercing effect.
A round with improved ballistic characteristics for the PM, the PB and the Fort-12 pistols. Due to the high initial velocity of its bullet, it is much more effective then a standard round. It has a better armor-piercing effect.
A standard round for the Walther P99 and the Beretta 92FS pistols and the HK MP5 submachine gun. It has a full-jacketed bullet with a weak armor-piercing effect.
An improved round for the Walther P99 and the Beretta 92FS pistols and the HK MP5 submachine gun. A high-powered round with a hollow-point bullet and an armor-piercing core.
An armor-piercing round for the Groza and the Val assault rifles and for the Vintorez special sniper rifle. It has a subsonic bullet which due to its special design can penetrate most bulletproof vests at a range of up to 400 meters.
A round for the Groza and the Val assault rifles and the Vintorez special sniper rifle. The later and cheaper modification of the armor-piercing round. It has a subsonic bullet which due to its special design can penetrate most bulletproof vests at a range of up to 300 meters.
A sniper round for the Groza and the Val assault rifles and the Vintorez special sniper rifle. It has a subsonic bullet which due to its heavy weight and special design can penetrate most bulletproof vests at a range of up to 400 meters.
Energy cells prepared with lethal elements in a Gauss rifle magazine. The energy source is an encapsulated piece of the Flash artifact.
A grenade for the М203 grenade launcher (for the LR-300, G36, Sig550, L85 rifles) and the integrated grenade launcher of the FN2000.
A highly-explosive grenade for the RPG-7V. It is equally effective against troops and light armored vehicles.
A grenade for the GP-25 Kostyer grenade launcher, the integrated grenade launcher of the Groza, and the RG-6 revolver grenade launcher.
A grenade for the GP-25 Kostyer grenade launcher, the integrated grenade launcher of the Groza and the RG-6 revolver grenade launcher. Prior explosion the grenade leaps up about one meter increasing its killing effect.
A defensive hand grenade with a large radius of splinter damage. It is recommended to throw it only from behind cover.
A smoke grenade
An offensive hand grenade with a small radius of splinter damage.
The weapon of the elite troops in the Russian army. It was designed as a replacement for the outdated AK-74. Not only the Abakan’s internal mechanisms but also its receiver and its barrel are movable, which decreases the recoil and increases accuracy.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.45x39 mm,\n armor-piercing 5.45x39 mm BP.
A grenade launcher for the AK-74 and AKS-74.\n Ammunition: VOG-25 grenade,\n and VOG-25R grenade.
A grenade launcher for the Sig 550, the LR300, the G36 and the L85A2.\n Ammunition: M209 grenades.
A widely used Soviet scope. The scope can be mounted on a weapon using a dovetail mount used by the Warsaw Pact countries.
A 4-x scope produced in the NATO countries. It can be attached to a standard NATO mount, also called the Picatinni rail.
An effective silencer made by Zone gunsmiths. The kit includes a set of adapters for weapons of any calibre.
Kalashnikov assault rifle with a folding butt, 1974 model, uses 5.45x39 mm ammunition. It is a simple and reliable weapon, but the cheapness of its production affected its ergonomy and accuracy. In the Zone, it is the main weapon of the military stalkers and of many solo fighters.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.45x39 mm,\n armor-piercing 5.45x39 mm BP.
The weight and size of the AKS-74U are similar to those of a submachine gun, but its operation mode and the ammunition it uses place it into the class of the assault rifles. Its advantages are its small dimensions very useful when fighting inside a building or in a thick forest and a relatively high piercing capabilities. Its main disadvantages are a limited accuracy range and quick overheating when firing bursts.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.45x39 mm,\n armor-piercing 5.45x39 mm BP.
Adopted by the American army and police, as well as many military and police units all over the world. It is also very popular among the criminals for its high-powered round and its high-capacity magazine.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x19 mm Parabellum,\n improved 9x19 mm PBP.
A sawn-off BM-16 rifle. It is lighter and more compact then the original two-barrel rifle, but it is effective only at a close range. One of the weapons most commonly used by beginners.\n Ammunition:\n 12x70 shot,\n 12x76 slug,\n 12x76 dart.
A classical automatic Colt which present in all the conflicts of the 20th century with honor and entered the new century with confidence. Its small-size magazine is partially compensated by the use of a high-powered round.\n Ammunition:\n standard .45 ACP,\n improved .45 ACP Hydro-Shock.
A real gun for real heroes. It is big, heavy and very destructive. It is not very popular in the Zone due to its price and size. After all, you don't go hunting for elephants every day!\n Ammunition:\n standard .45 ACP,\n improved .45 ACP Hydro-Shock.
An assault rifle combined with a grenade launcher. It is equipped with an electronic fire control module and a 40-mm grenade launcher.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.56x45 mm SS109,\n armor-piercing 5.56x45 mm АР.
A police pistol of Ukrainian production, replaced the PM. In comparison with the Makarov pistol, it has improved accuracy, ergonomics and a larger magazine, but it is less reliable.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x18 mm,\n improved 9x18 mm +P+.
A German assault rifle. It is a first-grade specimen of the modern weaponry: it is light, reliable, and ergonomic.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.56x45 mm SS109,\n armor-piercing 5.56x45 mm АР.
A super-accurate weapon made by the scientists in the Zone. It is almost noiseless, because instead of gunpowder, it uses the artifact's energy for firing. In spite of the Gauss gun’s tremendous firepower, the recoil is insignificant. The accuracy and the killing power of this gun exceed those of all other small arms.\n Ammunition: 2-mm Gauss rounds.
An assault rifle combined with a grenade launcher. It is a very good type of assault rifle for the Zone conditions: it is compact, reliable, but universal and powerful. The Groza is one of the favorite rifles of the military stalkers.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x39 mm PAB-9,\n armor-piercing 9x39 mm SP-6,\n sniper 9x39 mm SP-5,\n VOG-25 and VOG-25R grenades for the grenade launcher.
The Browning deserves to be considered as one of the best pistols of the 20th century. It is reliable, powerful and has a good grouping of shots. The magazine can hold 13 rounds.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x19 mm Parabellum,\n improved 9х19 mm PBP.
Hunting knife
After the British army replaced this rifle with the German-made G36, it appeared in large quantities first on the black market and then in the Zone. The L85A2’s main advantages are a standard 4-x scope and the high accuracy of the first shot. In burst mode, its accuracy decreases greatly, and the main mechanisms of the rifle are not reliable enough.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.56x45 mm SS109,\n armor-piercing 5.56x45 mm АР.
A new stage of development of the famous M-16, a light rifle with an effective fire range of up to 300 meters. Due its to exceptionally easy triggering, high ergonomics and low weight, the weapon is highly accurate, though it is too sensitive to dirt and is not always suitable for use under difficult field conditions.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.56x45 mm SS109,\n armor-piercing 5.56x45 mm АР.
One of the best weapons in the submachine gun class. During the last decades of the 20th century it was adopted by the army and police special forces units in many countries. When it was gradually replaced with more up-to-date models, it appeared on the black market, and then in the Zone.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x19 mm Parabellum,\n improved 9x19 mm PBP.
A pistol with an integrated silencer, it was used by Soviet special forces. It is now outdated, but in skilful hands, still very effective.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x18 mm,\n improved 9x18 mm +P+.
The most widespread pistol in the Zone. It is a legacy of the Soviet era. It is relatively reliable and cheap, has low magazine capacity, low power and an unsatisfactory grouping of shots. It is the main weapon of a beginning stalker.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x18 mm,\n improved 9x18 mm +P+.
A revolver-type grenade launcher. Sometimes, it is just indispensable, particularly when targeting large numbers of mutants, attacking well-guarded stationary objects or fighting especially tough creatures.\n Ammunition: VOG-25 grenade,\n and VOG-25R grenade.
A grenade launcher developed in the 1960s. Such grenade launchers are stored in large quantities in army depots, from where they are transferred to the Zone. Such weapon is rare for stalkers: its huge dimensions and heavy weight make it unpopular, though it is indispensable for some missions.\n Ammunition: OG-7V.
A model developed back in 1975 but still popular all around the world. Its magazine is low capacity, but its mechanism is absolutely reliable. Its second advantage is the use of the high-powered Colt round.\n Ammunition:\n standard .45 ACP,\n improved .45 ACP Hydro-Shock.
A relatively new Swiss assault rifle for the 5.56x45 mm SS109 round. This weapon is very popular due to its accuracy, soft recoil, and high reliability.\n Ammunition:\n standard 5.56x45 mm SS109,\n armor-piercing 5.56x45 mm АР.
The SPAS 12 smooth-bore rifle was developed in the late 1970th as an universal combat weapon for the police and the army assault units. This weapon is very reliable and flexibly used. It is however relatively big, expensive and its mechanism is too complex. Probably, this is the best close range gun in the Zone.\n Ammunition:\n 12x70 shot,\n 12x76 slug,\n 12x76 dart.
This rifle was widely used in all operations of the Soviet and Russian armies since 1960. It proved itself to be an exceptionally reliable and handy weapon. In the Zone it is preferred by the experienced stalkers of the Duty faction which hunt mutants.\n Ammunition:\n standard 7.62x54 mm 7N1,\n armor-piercing 7.62x54 mm BP,\n sniper 7.62x54 mm 7N14.
A more up-to-date version of the Dragunov rifle. A compact bullpup model. It is excellent for long trips in the Zone.\n Ammunition:\n standard 7.62x54 mm 7N1,\n armor-piercing 7.62x54 mm BP,\n sniper 7.62x54 mm 7N14.
This hunting rifle is popular but there’s nothing noteworthy about it.\n Ammunition:\n 12x70 shot,\n 12x76 slug,\n 12x76 dart.
A reliable German weapon. As a quality compact close-range weapon, it is very popular among the Zone veterans.\n Ammunition:\n standard .45 ACP,\n improved .45 ACP Hydro-Shock.
This weapon is based on the Vintorez noiseless sniper rifle, but it has a folding butt, can fire bursts and has a larger magazine. It was originally designed for special forces operating in conditions demanding noiseless and flameless fire.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x39 mm PAB-9,\n armor-piercing 9x39 mm SP-6,\n sniper 9x39 mm SP-5.
A special sniper rifle designed for noiseless and flameless sniper fire and equipped with an integrated silencer. It can pierce any bulletproof vest at a range of 400 meters. It is a weapon highly valued by stalkers of any level.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x39 mm PAB-9,\n armor-piercing 9x39 mm SP-6,\n sniper 9x39 mm SP-5.
An excellent German pistol. Highly reliable with a high capacity magazine and a good fire accuracy, especially in the case of the model designed for the 9 mm Parabellum round.\n Ammunition:\n standard 9x19 mm Parabellum,\n improved 9х19 mm PBP.
An American smooth-bore pump-action rifle made for use in the most hostile environment. It is very reliable. All its details are covered with anticorrosive coating.\n Ammunition:\n 12x70 shot,\n 12x76 slug,\n 12x76 dart.

;-----------------------------Уникальные оружия----------------------------------
Скорострельный АКС-74
Модифицированный затворный механизм увеличивает скорость стрельбы.
АН-94 снайперский
Автомат, снабженный модифицированным оптическим прицелом для ведения снайперского огня. Вмонтированная в корпус оптика обладает большей кратностью, чем стандартные прицелы.
Форт-15
Экспериментальный прототип пистолета Форт.
АКС-74У спецназ
Модифицированный автомат. Снабжен неснимаемым глушителем.
МП5 9х18
Легкий, компактный, а теперь еще и переделанный под распространенный калибр, этот пистолет-пулемет является настоящей находкой для начинающих сталкеров.
"Гроза" 5.45
Данный ствол - отличная работа одного из сталкеров-умельцев, которому удалось переделать винтовку под более распространенный патрон 5,45 мм.
СПАС-12 нарезной
Модифицированный на уменьшение дисперсии этот СПАС-12 плохо подходит для стрельбы дробью, зато идеально для стрельбы жеканом или дротиком.
Боевой винчестер
Модификация винчестера. В подствольную емкость для патронов был встроен небольшой фрагмент артефакта "Грави", ориентированный таким образом, чтобы увеличивать скорость полета пули.
Л85 Баланс
С помощью нескольких модификаций удалось уменьшить эффект подкидывания ствола.
ЛР300 снайперская
Модификация штурмового оружия под стрельбу одиночными выстрелами. Предполагалось, что она будет использоваться, как дешевый аналог снайперской винтовки.
СВД "Дальнобойщик"
Модифицирована оптика, за счет чего увеличена кратность зума. Улучшен балланс оружия, в результате уменьшена отдача.
Штурмовой СиГ
Оружие создавалось для ведения боев в условиях города. Чтобы облегчить вес, были убраны или заменены некоторые компоненты. В результате на оружие больше нельзя повесить ни прицел, ни подствольный гранатомет. Зато и вес снизился почти вдвое.
Большой Бэн
И без того мощный пистолет переработан под винтовочный патрон. Поистине убийственная штука для ближнего боя.
Безшумный кольт
Оружие наемных убийц. Старый добрый надежный кольт, снабженный неснимаемым глушителем.
Снайперский Вал
От базовой модели отличается возможностью добавлять оптический прицел ПСО-1.
Безшумная МП5
Модификация базовой модели. Добавлен неснимаемый глушитель.
АН-94 штурмовой
Данный автомат снабжен интегрированным подствольным гранатометом, что делает эту модель еще более универсальным оружием.
Облегченная Л85
Оружие снабжено интегрированным глушителем. Многие детали заменены на более легкие аналоги, что существенно уменьшает вес оружия.
СиГ снайперский
Модификация для ведения снайперского огня. Оружие снабжено неснимаемым оптическим прицелом повышенной кратности.
РГ-6 м209
Модификация револьверного гранатомета. Данная модель приспособлена для ведения огня гранатами западного образца.
Вальтер 9x18
Модификация пистолета для ведения огня боеприпасами калибра 9x18 мм.
